name: Ode to My Hometown's Craft Fair
name_original: Ode to My Hometown's Craft Fair
description:
My hometown has a biannual craft fair that I loved when I was a child. That was a long time ago though.

Ode to My Hometown's Craft Fair is a tiny vignette about nostalgia, growing up, and going home.

Play using the arrow keys.

Song credit: "Side Path" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
